channel.title: TrinityPk (718/742) Start Your Adventure Today!
channel.description:
[CENTER]DO NOT BE FOOLED BY THE NAME OF THE SERVER THIS IS A PvM & A PvP SERVER (ECONOMY BASED)
[B][U][I][SIZE=7]DOUBLE DROP NEX SCHEDULED AT 15+ PLAYERS!! GET YOUR FRIENDS!![/SIZE][/I][/U][/B]
[SIZE=5]WEBSITE[/SIZE] [url=http://trinitypk.com/]Home[/url]
[SIZE=5]DOWNLOAD CLIENT[/SIZE] https://www.dropbox.com/s/lnp4bld8xxheng6/TrinityPk.jar
- VPS Hosted - 24/7 - No lag - Stable Economy - 100% Uptime - Perfect hit formula for melee, range and magic - 138 combat, summoning counts - Constant Updates - Professional and active Staff - Developing Forums - New Runescape Armor - Unique DonatorZone (with shops) - Loyalty point system with shop (10 points every 30mins) - Various shops - Developing Dominion Tower - Lava Flow Mining - Jadinko Lair - Glacors - Frost Dragons - Bork - Tormented Demons - New Godwars (Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin) - Squeal of fortune - Gilded altar - Hunter - Fully working Nex - Curses, ancients etc - Queen Black Dragon - Fight Kiln - Fight Caves - Working chaotics - Gambling supported - Money pouch - Working clan wars! - Great staff and community - Fully working slayer and slayer tower! - Developing Auto-Voting - Developing Auto-Donate - Amazing PvP with custom combat - Owner takes all ideas into consideration. - Perfect switching - Unique home -Custom teleports -Fast exp gains - Custom titles -Custom item
[SIZE=3]Unique Home[/SIZE] [URL=http://s808.photobucket.com/user/Trill_O_G/media/TrinityPk-Home_zps524d0b2c.jpg.html][IMG]http://i808.photobucket.com/albums/zz7/Trill_O_G/TrinityPk-Home_zps524d0b2c.jpg[/img][/URL]
[SIZE=3]Various Shops Which Include The Donator Shop and The Loyalty Shop[/SIZE] [URL=http://s808.photobucket.com/user/Trill_O_G/media/TrinityPk-shops_zpsd1b2a9c2.gif.html][IMG]http://i808.photobucket.com/albums/zz7/Trill_O_G/TrinityPk-shops_zpsd1b2a9c2.gif[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s808.photobucket.com/user/Trill_O_G/media/TrinityPk-Loyalty-Shop_zps49faa31c.jpg.html][IMG]http://i808.photobucket.com/albums/zz7/Trill_O_G/TrinityPk-Loyalty-Shop_zps49faa31c.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s808.photobucket.com/user/Trill_O_G/media/TrinityPk-Donator-Shop_zps417072a7.jpg.html][IMG]http://i808.photobucket.com/albums/zz7/Trill_O_G/TrinityPk-Donator-Shop_zps417072a7.jpg[/img][/URL]
[SIZE=3]Training Spots Which Include Rockcrabs, Bandit Camp, Taverly Dungeon, Cows, Waterfall Caves and Yaks[/COLOR][/SIZE] [URL=http://s808.photobucket.com/user/Trill_O_G/media/TrinityPk-Training-Rockcrabs_zps1971df4e.jpg.html][IMG]http://i808.photobucket.com/albums/zz7/Trill_O_G/TrinityPk-Training-Rockcrabs_zps1971df4e.jpg[/img][/URL]
[SIZE=3]Fully Working NEX! And All GWD![/SIZE] [URL=http://s808.photobucket.com/user/Trill_O_G/media/TrinityPk-Nex_zpsa2ce40bc.jpg.html][IMG]http://i808.photobucket.com/albums/zz7/Trill_O_G/TrinityPk-Nex_zpsa2ce40bc.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s808.photobucket.com/user/Trill_O_G/media/TrinityPk-GWD-Bandos_zps1dc168bf.jpg.html][IMG]http://i808.photobucket.com/albums/zz7/Trill_O_G/TrinityPk-GWD-Bandos_zps1dc168bf.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s808.photobucket.com/user/Trill_O_G/media/TrinityPk-GWD-Armadyl_zpsc86b35ba.jpg.html][IMG]http://i808.photobucket.com/albums/zz7/Trill_O_G/TrinityPk-GWD-Armadyl_zpsc86b35ba.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s808.photobucket.com/user/Trill_O_G/media/TrinityPk-GWD-Zamorak_zps5fef9488.jpg.html][IMG]http://i808.photobucket.com/albums/zz7/Trill_O_G/TrinityPk-GWD-Zamorak_zps5fef9488.jpg[/img][/URL]
[SIZE=3]Some Misc. Monsters That You Can Make BANK OFF![/SIZE] [URL=http://s808.photobucket.com/user/Trill_O_G/media/TrinityPk-Frost-Dragons_zpsb1ad1df2.jpg.html][IMG]http://i808.photobucket.com/albums/zz7/Trill_O_G/TrinityPk-Frost-Dragons_zpsb1ad1df2.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s808.photobucket.com/user/Trill_O_G/media/TrinityPk-Tormented-Demons_zpsb78a977f.jpg.html][IMG]http://i808.photobucket.com/albums/zz7/Trill_O_G/TrinityPk-Tormented-Demons_zpsb78a977f.jpg[/img] [/URL] [URL=http://s808.photobucket.com/user/Trill_O_G/media/TrinityPk-Jadinko_zps97d37ccb.jpg.html][IMG]http://i808.photobucket.com/albums/zz7/Trill_O_G/TrinityPk-Jadinko_zps97d37ccb.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s808.photobucket.com/user/Trill_O_G/media/TrinityPk-Glacors_zpsd3c3b43d.jpg.html][IMG]http://i808.photobucket.com/albums/zz7/Trill_O_G/TrinityPk-Glacors_zpsd3c3b43d.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s808.photobucket.com/user/Trill_O_G/media/TrinityPk-Ice-Strykewyrm_zpsed7df977.jpg.html][IMG]http://i808.photobucket.com/albums/zz7/Trill_O_G/TrinityPk-Ice-Strykewyrm_zpsed7df977.jpg[/img][/URL]
[SIZE=3]Regular & Extreme Donator Shop + Extreme Donator Place[/SIZE] [URL=http://s808.photobucket.com/user/Trill_O_G/media/TrinityPk-Regular-Donator-Shop_zps13ed887d.jpg.html][IMG]http://i808.photobucket.com/albums/zz7/Trill_O_G/TrinityPk-Regular-Donator-Shop_zps13ed887d.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s808.photobucket.com/user/Trill_O_G/media/TrinityPk-Extreme-Donator-Shop_zps3d5b150b.jpg.html][IMG]http://i808.photobucket.com/albums/zz7/Trill_O_G/TrinityPk-Extreme-Donator-Shop_zps3d5b150b.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s808.photobucket.com/user/Trill_O_G/media/TrinityPk-Extreme-Donator-Place_zps97a5aa37.jpg.html][IMG]http://i808.photobucket.com/albums/zz7/Trill_O_G/TrinityPk-Extreme-Donator-Place_zps97a5aa37.jpg[/img][/URL]
[SIZE=3]Custom Minigame With Cool REWARDS![/SIZE] [URL=http://s808.photobucket.com/user/Trill_O_G/media/TrinityPk-Custom-Minigame_zps70fb3c1f.jpg.html][IMG]http://i808.photobucket.com/albums/zz7/Trill_O_G/TrinityPk-Custom-Minigame_zps70fb3c1f.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s808.photobucket.com/user/Trill_O_G/media/TrinityPk-Custom-Minigame-Shop_zps797eb332.jpg.html][IMG]http://i808.photobucket.com/albums/zz7/Trill_O_G/TrinityPk-Custom-Minigame-Shop_zps797eb332.jpg[/img][/URL]
